stateDiagram

%% Initial state name as "." so that it fits in black circle shape.
%% See https://github.com/StateSmith/StateSmith/issues/404
state "." as ROOT.(InitialState)

state Deal {

        DealFirst

        DealFirst : DealFirst

        DealMid

        DealMid : DealMid

        DealLast

        DealLast : DealLast

        %% Initial state name as "." so that it fits in black circle shape.
        %% See https://github.com/StateSmith/StateSmith/issues/404
        state "." as Deal.(InitialState)

        SelectTrump

        SelectTrump : SelectTrump

        state Play {

                PlayFirst

                PlayFirst : PlayFirst

                PlayMid

                PlayMid : PlayMid

                PlayLast

                PlayLast : PlayLast

                %% Initial state name as "." so that it fits in black circle shape.
                %% See https://github.com/StateSmith/StateSmith/issues/404
                state "." as Play.(InitialState)

                state Meld {

                        %% Initial state name as "." so that it fits in black circle shape.
                        %% See https://github.com/StateSmith/StateSmith/issues/404
                        state "." as Meld.(InitialState)

                        TryMelded

                        TryMelded : TryMelded

                        Melded

                        Melded : Melded

                        NoMeld

                        NoMeld : NoMeld

                        AddPoint

                        AddPoint : AddPoint

                        NewTrick

                        NewTrick : NewTrick

                }

        }

}

AddOneCardToAll

AddOneCardToAll : AddOneCardToAll

L9Play

L9Play : L9Play

ROOT.(InitialState) --> Deal

DealFirst --> DealMid : Complete

DealMid --> DealLast : Complete

DealLast --> SelectTrump : Complete

Deal.(InitialState) --> DealFirst

SelectTrump --> Play : Complete

PlayFirst --> PlayMid : HasMid

PlayFirst --> PlayLast : Complete

PlayMid --> PlayLast : Complete

PlayLast --> Meld : do

Play.(InitialState) --> PlayFirst

Meld.(InitialState) --> TryMelded

TryMelded --> Melded : Success

TryMelded --> NoMeld : Failed

Melded --> AddPoint : Complete

NoMeld --> NewTrick : Complete

AddPoint --> NewTrick : Complete

NewTrick --> AddOneCardToAll : Complete

AddOneCardToAll --> PlayFirst : Complete

AddOneCardToAll --> L9Play : DeckEmpty
